name: RIDLE
description:
This game is a single-player 2D action game.
You control RIDLE to find the keys that exist on the stage and rescue the animals from the jail!

Vertical and horizontal stage exploration

RIDLE can stick to walls and move across the stage in any direction.

Explore the stage, collect items, and defeat enemy monsters to clear the stage!

Aim to clear the screen with easy operation!

It can be operated with only the movement keys and three buttons.

・Keyboard and gamepad operation are supported.
・Each key can be changed on the configuration screen.

Aim to clear the highest rank!

When the game is completed, the rank is evaluated in several categories.

Play the game over and over again to clear the game at the highest rank.
